panels.visual: Visual: The inner sanctum - a circular chamber with a domed ceiling painted with stars (now dim). In the center, a stone altar. SPORE is bound to it by chains of shadow, releasing SCARED GRAY SPORES. And rising behind the altar - THE SHADOW SORCERER. Hooded figure, tattered robes, hollow masked face, BURNING PURPLE EYES. Location: Temple Inner Sanctum (corrupted) Characters: Shadow Sorcerer, Spore (captive)
panels.dialogue: Shadow Sorcerer: "So. Another candidate. Another CHOSEN ONE."

characters.SporeCaptive: Spore bound to the altar by chains of shadow in the corrupted Temple sanctum. Releasing scared gray spores. Big eyes wide with fear but lighting up with hope when Lightsword arrives. Struggling weakly against the dark chains.
characters.ShadowSorcerer: A hooded figure in tattered dark robes - once a Choosing candidate who failed and died in bitterness centuries ago. Face is a hollow mask of who they once were. Purple eyes burning with jealousy and rage. Form flickers between solid and shadow. Tragic rather than purely evil.
characters.Shadow: An incorporeal undead creature of pure darkness, vaguely humanoid silhouette with no distinguishing features except cold pinpricks of malevolent white light for eyes. Sliding along walls and floor, reaching with grasping shadow hands toward the trapped pegasus.
